data.eml:eml: Tabasconura tapijulapana gen. nov. sp. nov. (Collembola: Neanuridae) from Tabasco, México

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Palacios-Vargas, José G., Catalán, Elihú (2015): Tabasconura tapijulapana gen. nov. sp. nov. (Collembola: Neanuridae) from Tabasco, México. Zootaxa 3947 (1): 131-138, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3947.1.9
